data.title: Get a copy of a public safety report | Services
data.meta_description: How to request a copy of public safety records, including police, fire, traffic crash, and emergency medical services (EMS) reports.
data.text:
Use the table below to determine which application you need and how much it will cost to apply.

You can pay by cash, money order, business check, or certified check. We do not accept personal checks, credit cards, or debit cards. Make checks payable to “City of Philadelphia.”
